returns._0: trackerIndex the index of the tracker

params._contractAddress: address of the contract to have policies applied

params._policyId: the policy Id of the foreign call to retrieve

params._foreignCallId: the Id of the foreign call to retrieve
params._policyId: the policy Id of the foreign call to retrieve
the policyId the trackerStorage is associated with
the policyId the trackerStorage is associated with
params.index: postion of the tracker to return

updateForeignCall(uint256,address,string.details: Builds a foreign call structure and adds it to the contracts storage, mapped to the contract address it is associated with

params._policyId: the policy Id of the policy the foreign call will be mapped to
params.arguments: the parameter types of the foreign calls arguments in order
params.foreignContractAddress: the address of the contract where the foreign call exists
params.functionSignature: the string representation of the function signature of the foreign call
params.returnType: the parameter type of the foreign calls return value

params.functionSignature: the string representation of the function signature
params.pTypes: the types of the parameters for the function in order

updatePolicy(uint256,bytes[],uint256[],u.details: The parameters had to be complex because nested structs are not allowed for externally facing functions

params.functionSignatureIds: corresponding signature ids in the policy. The elements in this array are one to one matches of the elements in _signatures array. They store the functionSignatureId for each of the signatures in _signatures array.
params.ruleIds: two dimensional array of the rules. This array contains a simple count at first level and the second level is the array of ruleId's within the policy.

params._policyId: the policyId the trackerStorage is associated with

applyPolicy(address,uint256[]).notice: Apply the policies to the contracts.

getAppliedPolicyIds(address).notice: Get an applied policyId from storage.

getFunctionSignature(uint256).notice: Get a function signature from storage.

getTracker(uint256).notice: Return a TrackerValuesSet from the trackerStorage.

getTracker(uint256,uint256).notice: Return a tracker from the trackerStorage.

updateFunctionSignature(uint256,bytes4,u.notice: Add a function signature to the storage.

updateRule(uint256,(uint256[],(uint256[].notice: Add a rule to the ruleStorage mapping.

updateTracker(uint256,uint256,address,st.notice: Function to update tracker in trackerStorage mapping.
